summary: REQ-31 is not fully satisfied based on the diff summary: the change is not clearly limited to the specific XPath-selected <span>, and additional styling/behavior appears to be applied to surrounding elements. Also, the <span> only has `text-center` with no evidence of being made full-width/block to ensure centering within its available width.
